backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, daily orders, karigar mappings, and assignments with access‑controlled CRUD APIs and blob‑storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in the application.
frontend/ic-assets.json5: Asset configuration controlling caching behavior, disabling cache for index.html and setting long cache for other assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app and SheetJS library with no-cache headers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component with navigation, sidebar, build ID display, and tab-based routing.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Placeholder file for a profile setup modal component with no content provided.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/compo: Dialog for assigning selected orders to a karigar and optional factory using a mutation hook.
Exports all orders for the selected factory to HTML/PDF, handling loading state.
Groups factory orders by karigar, supports filtering, selection, and per‑karigar PDF export.
Sidebar listing factories with order counts and selection controls.
Table displaying orders with assignment, generic name mapping, and row selection.
Toolbar providing search and design‑code sorting controls for the orders table.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/Daily: Main page for viewing, uploading, parsing, filtering, sorting, and saving daily orders with selection and diagnostics.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/excel: Parses Excel/CSV rows into normalized orders, auto‑detects headers, and returns warnings.
Parses karigar mapping files from Excel or PDF, detects relevant columns, and builds normalized mapping entries per sheet. Prioritizes sheets 1 and 3 over 2 and normalizes design codes for lookup.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/expor: Exports enriched daily orders to an Excel file, adding generic name and karigar columns when available. Builds a worksheet from orders and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/hooks: Provides search and sorting logic for filtering orders by text and sorting by design. Returns filtered orders and state handlers.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/pdf/e: Generates an HTML file grouping orders by karigar for a factory-wide view, including generic names via normalized design lookup. Downloads the result as an HTML file.
Generates an HTML export for a single karigar’s orders with generic names resolved via normalized design codes. Creates and downloads an HTML file.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/ka: Encodes and decodes karigar mapping data to and from a JSON-based ExternalBlob, recomputing normalized design keys for backward compatibility. Ensures stored data is canonical for lookup.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/Ka: UI for uploading, parsing, and saving karigar mapping files with progress tracking and error handling. Converts parsed mappings to storable blob format and sends them to the backend.
frontend/src/features/order-list/compone: Renders grouped orders by karigar with selection checkboxes and an Excel export button, showing either all groups or a single selected karigar.
Displays a simple table of karigar orders with selection checkboxes and basic order fields.
frontend/src/features/order-list/OrderLi: Fetches daily orders and mapping data, enriches orders with karigar and generic names, and groups them for display. Includes diagnostics and UI state for filtering and selection.
frontend/src/features/order-list/useKari: Decodes a mapping blob into a lookup map keyed by normalized design codes, handling priority sheets and exposing decode status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithStatus.ts: Wraps useActor to provide simple ready/loading status and a placeholder refetch handler.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, managing login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating daily orders and karigar assignments using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark mode themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration file placeholder for jspdf.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Declares TypeScript definitions for window.XLSX to support reading and writing Excel data.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Provides helpers to return a human-readable or raw build timestamp injected by Vite.
frontend/src/utils/textNormalize.ts: Offers text normalization functions for cleaning cell values, headers, and design codes, plus header-alias matching.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts unknown errors into user-friendly messages and adds retry guidance when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the app’s state, requirements, known issues, and architecture for the order-management workflow.
